One of my favourites zombie movies.(Nr 2. Nr 1 is Burial Ground by Andrea Bianchi. I upload that one in a few days)

A bitter Irish police detective is investigating a sudden rash of violent murders (the work of Satanists, he&#039;s convinced) and closes in on a pair of newcomers to the sleepy Northern England town, longhaired antique dealer Ray Lovelock and his nervous traveling companion Christine GalbÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³. Only they know the real culprits: newly deceased corpses, revived by agricultural experiments in ultrasonic radiation that are also turning newborns into vicious little monsters. 

AKA The Living Dead at Manchester Morgue, Don&#039;t Open the Window, Do Not Speak Ill of the Dead and several other titles..

Ripped from the Anchor Bay release. Not my rip...
